overview: Alex O’Cinneide was appointed in Jan 07 to manage the Masdar Clean Tech Fund (ADFEC) and to represent the Abu Dhabi Future Energy Company to the partnership. Previous to joining Masdar he was a Managing Partner in Quorum European Partners, an energy technology focused venture capital firm. He started his career in two VC backed technology companies before going on to join KPMG where he was a director in the Strategy and Private Equity Advisory group (London & New York). He holds a BA and MA from Trinity College Dublin, an MSc from the London School of Economics and a Masters in Finance from the London Business School.
